Projects.title: TokoManagement
desc: A store management web app that centralizes inventory, supplier, customer, and order workflows so owners can track daily operations without juggling spreadsheets.
Built with Laravel and Vue for fast CRUD and responsive UI, backed by MySQL and Dockerized pipelines on GitLab CI/CD to keep deployments reliable.

Projects.title: WHAStore
desc: WHAStore is a web e-commerce platform with a Go backend and Next.js frontend, using Zod to keep catalog, cart, and checkout flows consistently validated.
Midtrans powers payments, while PostgreSQL and Redis handle persistence and caching. Everything is Dockerized with GitLab CI/CD so releases stay fast and repeatable.

Projects.title: Avocycle
desc: A farmer-facing web app to manage avocado production - from tracking growers and plots to logging harvests and coordinating supply with buyers.
Built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Axios for a responsive dashboard that keeps farmer data, inventory, and order status clear and actionable.

Projects.title: Predict Goal
desc: A Python-based project that trains Random Forest and KNN models on two Premier League seasons to predict total match goals.
Backend runs on Flask and is deployed to Railway, while Streamlit with HTML/CSS fronts the prediction UI so users can test scenarios directly in the browser.

Projects.title: Sarponesia
desc: A company profile site for a coffee producer, showcasing the business story, product lineup, and pricing to support promotion and customer inquiries.
Built with Laravel and MySQL to keep content manageable and product data structured.

Projects.title: SIMKLINIK UI/UX
desc: Designed the UI/UX for a veterinary clinic management system, focusing on clear flows for appointments, patient records, and billing.
Prototyped in Figma to keep handoff smooth for frontend implementation.
